item.title: Programming quotes
item.author: Author
item.description: It has been said that the great scientific disciplines are examples of giants standing on the shoulders of other giants. It has also been said that the software industry is an example of midgets standing on the toes of other midgets. - Alan Cooper Changing random stuff until your program works is bad coding practice, but if you do it fast enough it’s Machine Learning. - @manisha72617183 Make it work, then make it beautiful, then if you really, really have to, make it fast.
